page.title: 07Visitors to this area.
page.content: Many tourists come to this area to see the spactacular scenery. It encompasses some of the sheerest cliffs and most rugged countryside. The visitors to this area tend to come from the more local holiday areas ie Hayle, Perranporth, St Ives. Within an approximate 10 mile radius of Hell's Mouth. To cater for the tourists there are car-parks and a small cafe/shop. There is a sign at Hell's Mouth warning people of the sheer drop. The majority of tourits will just park and look at the view, though some will walk the coastal footpath. There are also a few small caves which can be reached, but these are hard to get to. Due to landslides, the cliff is getting closer to the car-parks and road all the time.
